You need dedicated resources for your needs and projects?  
It's perfect! We now have in stock a few dedicated servers in Europe!

<hr>

**ATOM-4GB**

* Intel Atom N2800/D425
* 4GB Dedicated RAM
* 1TB SATA Hard-Drive
* 100Mbps unmetered
* 1IPv4 + 1IPv6 (/128)
* Roubaix or Graveline, EU. (First Available)
* DDoS Protected (Best effort)
* Price: 20.00$ CAD by month (~$15 USD)

Order link: https://clients.gestiondbi.com/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=171

This deal is valid until supply last. Hurry!

We also have other configuration and servers available in France, and across North America. Contact our Sales team for a quote!

<hr> 

* We accept TOR Relay on our Dedicated IP Services. Read AuP for more information
* We accept Paypal, Stripe, Bitcoin (via Bitpay) and Interac e-Transfer for Canadians Customers
* Looking Glass: https://www.gestiondbi.com/faq/
* We speak French and English. You can reach us 24/7, via the following link: http://gdbi.pw/contact

Regards, David.
